pli-tv-kd16:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-kd16:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanaṃ apaññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:1.1.3: Te ca bhikkhū tahaṃ tahaṃ viharanti—
pli-tv-kd16:1.1.4: araññe, rukkhamūle, pabbate, kandarāyaṃ, giriguhāyaṃ, susāne, vanapatthe, ajjhokāse, palālapuñje.
pli-tv-kd16:1.1.6: araññā rukkhamūlā pabbatā kandarā giriguhā susānā vanapatthā ajjhokāsā palālapuñjā, pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena, ālokitena vilokitena, samiñjitena pasāritena, okkhittacakkhū, iriyāpathasampannā.
pli-tv-kd16:1.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahako seṭṭhī kālasseva uyyānaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd16:1.2.2: Addasā kho rājagahako seṭṭhī te bhikkhū kālasseva tato tato upanikkhamante—
pli-tv-kd16:1.2.3: araññā rukkhamūlā pabbatā kandarā giriguhā susānā vanapatthā ajjhokāsā palālapuñjā, pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena, ālokitena vilokitena, samiñjitena pasāritena, okkhittacakkhū, iriyāpathasampanne.
pli-tv-kd16:1.2.5: Atha kho rājagahako seṭṭhī yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd16:1.2.6: “sacāhaṃ, bhante, vihāre kārāpeyyaṃ, vaseyyātha me vihāresū”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:1.2.8: “Tena hi, bhante, bhagavantaṃ paṭipucchitvā mama āroceyyāthā”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:1.2.10: kho te bhikkhū rājagahakassa seṭṭhissa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd16:1.2.11: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:1.2.13: Kathaṃ nu kho, bhante, amhehi paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:1.2.14: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd16:1.3.1: Atha kho te bhikkhū yena rājagahako seṭṭhī tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā rājagahakaṃ seṭṭhiṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:1.3.4: Atha kho rājagahako seṭṭhī ekāheneva saṭṭhivihāre patiṭṭhāpesi.
pli-tv-kd16:1.3.5: Atha kho rājagahako seṭṭhī te saṭṭhivihāre pariyosāpetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd16:1.3.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājagahako seṭṭhī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd16:1.3.7: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:1.3.9: Atha kho rājagahako seṭṭhī bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd16:1.4.1: Atha kho rājagahako seṭṭhī tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi—
pli-tv-kd16:1.4.3: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena rājagahakassa seṭṭhissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-kd16:1.4.4: Atha kho rājagahako seṭṭhī buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā, bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ, ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd16:1.4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājagahako seṭṭhī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd16:1.4.6: “ete me, bhante, saṭṭhivihārā puññatthikena saggatthikena kārāpitā.
pli-tv-kd16:1.4.8: “Tena hi tvaṃ, gahapati, te saṭṭhivihāre āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṃghassa patiṭṭhāpehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:1.4.9: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho rājagahako seṭṭhī bhagavato paṭissutvā te saṭṭhivihāre āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṃghassa patiṭṭhāpesi.
pli-tv-kd16:1.5.1: Atha kho bhagavā rājagahakaṃ seṭṭhiṃ imāhi gāthāhi anumodi—
pli-tv-kd16:1.5.24: Atha kho bhagavā rājagahakaṃ seṭṭhiṃ imāhi gāthāhi anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd16:2.1.2: “bhagavatā kira vihārā anuññātā”ti sakkaccaṃ vihāre kārāpenti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.1.7: Bhittichiddaṃ karitvā valliyāpi rajjuyāpi kavāṭaṃ bandhanti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.1.18: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū na sakkonti kavāṭaṃ apāpurituṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:2.1.23: Yehi te ugghāṭetvā pavisanti, vihārā aguttā honti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena vihārā tiṇacchadanā honti;
pli-tv-kd16:2.2.5: Tena kho pana samayena vihārā avātapānakā honti acakkhussā duggandhā.
pli-tv-kd16:2.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū chamāyaṃ sayanti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.3.12: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa sosāniko masārako mañco uppanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.3.18: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa sosāniko bundikābaddho mañco uppanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.3.24: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa sosāniko kuḷīrapādako mañco uppanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.3.30: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa sosāniko āhaccapādako mañco uppanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa āsandiko uppanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ucce mañce sayanti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.5.2: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd16:2.5.7: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu nīce mañce sayanto ahinā daṭṭho hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.5.10: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ucce mañcapaṭipādake dhārenti, saha mañcapaṭipādakehi pavedhenti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.5.11: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd16:2.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa suttaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.6.15: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū addhakāyikāni bibbohanāni dhārenti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.6.16: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd16:2.7.1: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe giraggasamajjo hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.7.4: Te vītivatte samajje chaviṃ uppāṭetvā haranti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.7.5: Addasāsuṃ kho bhikkhū samajjaṭṭhāne bahuṃ uṇṇampi coḷakampi vākampi tiṇampi paṇṇampi chaṭṭitaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:2.7.9: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa senāsanaparikkhārikaṃ dussaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.7.12: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū mañcabhisiṃ pīṭhe santharanti, pīṭhabhisiṃ mañce santharanti.
pli-tv-kd16:2.7.17: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ullokaṃ karitvā santharitvā bhisiṃ onandhitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena titthiyānaṃ seyyāyo setavaṇṇā honti, kāḷavaṇṇakatā bhūmi, gerukaparikammakatā bhitti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.1.5: Tena kho pana samayena pharusāya bhittiyā setavaṇṇo na nipatati.
pli-tv-kd16:3.1.7: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, thusapiṇḍaṃ datvā pāṇikāya paṭibāhetvā setavaṇṇaṃ nipātetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.1.9: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, saṇhamattikaṃ datvā pāṇikāya paṭibāhetvā setavaṇṇaṃ nipātetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.1.12: Tena kho pana samayena pharusāya bhittiyā gerukā na nipatati.
pli-tv-kd16:3.1.14: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, thusapiṇḍaṃ datvā pāṇikāya paṭibāhetvā gerukaṃ nipātetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.1.16: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kuṇḍakamattikaṃ datvā pāṇikāya paṭibāhetvā gerukaṃ nipātetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.1.21: Tena kho pana samayena pharusāya bhūmiyā kāḷavaṇṇo na nipatati.
pli-tv-kd16:3.1.23: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, thusapiṇḍaṃ datvā pāṇikāya paṭibāhetvā kāḷavaṇṇaṃ nipātetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.1.25: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gaṇḍumattikaṃ datvā pāṇikāya paṭibāhetvā kāḷavaṇṇaṃ nipātetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū vihāre paṭibhānacittaṃ kārāpenti—
pli-tv-kd16:3.2.3: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd16:3.2.9: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, mālākammaṃ latākammaṃ makaradantakaṃ pañcapaṭikan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena vihārā nīcavatthukā honti, udakena otthariyyanti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.3.12: Tena kho pana samayena vihārā āḷakamandā honti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.3.21: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū khuddake vihāre majjhe gabbhaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.3.24: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, khuddake vihāre ekamantaṃ gabbhaṃ kātuṃ, mahallake majjhe”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena vihārassa kuṭṭapādo jīrati.
pli-tv-kd16:3.4.6: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno tiṇacchadanā ahi khandhe patati.
pli-tv-kd16:3.4.10: Atha kho so bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd16:3.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū mañcapādepi pīṭhapādepi thavikāyo laggenti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.5.5: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū mañcepi pīṭhepi cīvaraṃ nikkhipanti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.5.9: Tena kho pana samayena vihārā anāḷindakā honti appaṭissaraṇā.
pli-tv-kd16:3.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ajjhokāse bhattavissaggaṃ karontā sītenapi uṇhenapi kilamanti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.6.16: setavaṇṇaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ gerukaparikammaṃ mālākammaṃ latākammaṃ makaradantakaṃ pañcapaṭikaṃ cīvaravaṃsaṃ cīvararajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.6.17: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ajjhokāse chamāya cīvaraṃ pattharanti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.7.15: setavaṇṇaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ gerukaparikammaṃ mālākammaṃ latākammaṃ makaradantakaṃ pañcapaṭikaṃ cīvaravaṃsaṃ cīvararajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.8.1: Tena kho pana samayena vihārā aparikkhittā honti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.8.10: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kavāṭaṃ piṭṭhasaṅghāṭaṃ udukkhalikaṃ uttarapāsakaṃ aggaḷavaṭṭiṃ kapisīsakaṃ sūcikaṃ ghaṭikaṃ tāḷacchiddaṃ āviñchanacchiddaṃ āviñchanarajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.8.13: setavaṇṇaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ gerukaparikammaṃ mālākammaṃ latākammaṃ makaradantakaṃ pañcapaṭikan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.8.14: Tena kho pana samayena pariveṇaṃ cikkhallaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.9.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū pariveṇe tahaṃ tahaṃ aggiṭṭhānaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.9.16: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kavāṭaṃ piṭṭhasaṅghāṭaṃ udukkhalikaṃ uttarapāsakaṃ aggaḷavaṭṭiṃ kapisīsakaṃ sūcikaṃ ghaṭikaṃ tāḷacchiddaṃ āviñchanacchiddaṃ āviñchanarajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.9.19: setavaṇṇaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ gerukaparikammaṃ mālākammaṃ latākammaṃ makaradantakaṃ pañcapaṭikaṃ cīvaravaṃsaṃ cīvararajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.10.1: Tena kho pana samayena ārāmo aparikkhitto hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.10.8: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, koṭṭhakaṃ apesiṃ yamakakavāṭaṃ toraṇaṃ palighan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.10.11: setavaṇṇaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ gerukaparikammaṃ mālākammaṃ latākammaṃ makaradantakaṃ pañcapaṭikan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.11.1: Tena kho pana samayena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro saṃghassa atthāya sudhāmattikālepanaṃ pāsādaṃ kāretukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:3.11.3: “kiṃ nu kho bhagavatā chadanaṃ anuññātaṃ, kiṃ ananuññātan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati rājagahakassa seṭṭhissa bhaginipatiko hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.1.2: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati rājagahaṃ agamāsi kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-kd16:4.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahakena seṭṭhinā svātanāya buddhappamukho saṃgho nimantito hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.1.4: Atha kho rājagahako seṭṭhī dāse ca kammakāre ca āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd16:4.1.5: “tena hi, bhaṇe, kālasseva uṭṭhāya yāguyo pacatha, bhattāni pacatha, sūpāni sampādetha, uttaribhaṅgāni sampādethā”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.1.7: “pubbe khvāyaṃ gahapati mayi āgate sabbakiccāni nikkhipitvā mamaññeva saddhiṃ paṭisammodati.
pli-tv-kd16:4.1.8: Sodānāyaṃ vikkhittarūpo dāse ca kammakāre ca āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd16:4.1.9: ‘tena hi, bhaṇe, kālasseva uṭṭhāya yāguyo pacatha, bhattāni pacatha, sūpāni sampādetha, uttaribhaṅgāni sampādethā’ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.1.10: Kiṃ nu kho imassa gahapatissa āvāho vā bhavissati, vivāho vā bhavissati, mahāyañño vā paccupaṭṭhito, rājā vā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro nimantito svātanāya saddhiṃ balakāyenā”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:4.2.1: Atha kho rājagahako seṭṭhī dāse ca kammakāre ca āṇāpetvā yena anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā saddhiṃ paṭisammoditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd16:4.2.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho rājagahakaṃ seṭṭhiṃ anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd16:4.2.3: “pubbe kho tvaṃ, gahapati, mayi āgate sabbakiccāni nikkhipitvā mamaññeva saddhiṃ paṭisammodasi.
pli-tv-kd16:4.2.4: Sodāni tvaṃ vikkhittarūpo dāse ca kammakāre ca āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd16:4.2.5: ‘tena hi, bhaṇe, kālasseva uṭṭhāya yāguyo pacatha, bhattāni pacatha, sūpāni sampādetha, uttaribhaṅgāni sampādethā’ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.2.6: Kiṃ nu kho te, gahapati, āvāho vā bhavissati, vivāho vā bhavissati, mahāyañño vā paccupaṭṭhito, rājā vā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro nimantito svātanāya saddhiṃ balakāyenā”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:4.2.7: “Na me, gahapati, āvāho vā bhavissati, nāpi vivāho vā bhavissati, nāpi rājā vā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro nimantito svātanāya saddhiṃ balakāyena;
pli-tv-kd16:4.2.16: “Ghosopi kho eso, gahapati, dullabho lokasmiṃ yadidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:4.2.18: Sakkā nu kho, gahapati, imaṃ kālaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhan”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:4.2.19: “Akālo kho, gahapati, imaṃ kālaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:4.2.20: Svedāni tvaṃ kālena taṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamissasi arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.2.22: svedānāhaṃ kālena taṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamissāmi arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhanti—
pli-tv-kd16:4.2.23: buddhagatāya satiyā nipajjitvā rattiyā sudaṃ tikkhattuṃ vuṭṭhāsi pabhātaṃ maññamāno.
pli-tv-kd16:4.3.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena sivakadvāraṃ tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd16:4.3.3: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nagaramhā nikkhantassa āloko antaradhāyi, andhakāro pāturahosi, bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso udapādi;
pli-tv-kd16:4.3.5: Atha kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussāvesi—
pli-tv-kd16:4.3.14: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa andhakāro antaradhāyi, āloko pāturahosi.
pli-tv-kd16:4.3.15: Yaṃ ahosi bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso so paṭippassambhi.
pli-tv-kd16:4.3.18: anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa āloko antaradhāyi, andhakāro pāturahosi, bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso udapādi, tatova puna nivattitukāmo ahosi.
pli-tv-kd16:4.3.19: Tatiyampi kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussāvesi—
pli-tv-kd16:4.3.28: Tatiyampi kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa andhakāro antaradhāyi, āloko pāturahosi, yaṃ ahosi bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso, so paṭippassambhi.
pli-tv-kd16:4.4.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena sītavanaṃ tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd16:4.4.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya ajjhokāse caṅkamati.
pli-tv-kd16:4.4.3: Addasā kho bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:4.4.4: Disvāna caṅkamā orohitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd16:4.4.5: Nisajja kho bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd16:4.4.9: haṭṭho udaggo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd16:4.5.1: Atha kho bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:4.5.2: dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ, kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ, nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi.
pli-tv-kd16:4.5.3: Yadā bhagavā aññāsi anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ kallacittaṃ muducittaṃ vinīvaraṇacittaṃ udaggacittaṃ pasannacittaṃ, atha yā buddhānaṃ sāmukkaṃsikā dhammadesanā taṃ pakāsesi—
pli-tv-kd16:4.5.5: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṃ vatthaṃ apagatakāḷakaṃ sammadeva rajanaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya;
pli-tv-kd16:4.5.6: evameva anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
pli-tv-kd16:4.5.8: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo tiṇṇavicikiccho vigatakathaṃkatho vesārajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusāsane bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd16:4.5.10: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya—
pli-tv-kd16:4.5.13: Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, dhammañca, bhikkhusaṃghañca.
pli-tv-kd16:4.5.14: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gataṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:4.5.15: Adhivāsetu ca me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.5.17: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.2: “anāthapiṇḍikena kira gahapatinā svātanāya buddhappamukho saṃgho nimantito”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.3: Atha kho rājagahako seṭṭhī anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.4: “tayā kira, gahapati, svātanāya buddhappamukho saṃgho nimantito.
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.6: Demi te, gahapati, veyyāyikaṃ yena tvaṃ buddhappamukhassa saṃghassa bhattaṃ kareyyāsī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.7: “Alaṃ, gahapati, atthi me veyyāyikaṃ yenāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa saṃghassa bhattaṃ karissāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.9: “anāthapiṇḍikena kira gahapatinā svātanāya buddhappamukho saṃgho nimantito”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.10: Atha kho rājagahako negamo anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.11: “tayā kira, gahapati, svātanāya buddhappamukho saṃgho nimantito.
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.13: Demi te, gahapati, veyyāyikaṃ yena tvaṃ buddhappamukhassa saṃghassa bhattaṃ kareyyāsī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.15: atthi me veyyāyikaṃ yenāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa saṃghassa bhattaṃ karissāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.16: Assosi kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro—
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.17: “anāthapiṇḍikena kira gahapatinā svātanāya buddhappamukho saṃgho nimantito”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.18: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.19: “tayā kira, gahapati, svātanāya buddhappamukho saṃgho nimantito.
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.21: Demi te, gahapati, veyyāyikaṃ yena tvaṃ buddhappamukhassa saṃghassa bhattaṃ kareyyāsī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.6.23: atthi me veyyāyikaṃ yenāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa saṃghassa bhattaṃ karissāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.7.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati tassā rattiyā accayena rājagahakassa seṭṭhissa nivesane paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi—
pli-tv-kd16:4.7.3: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena rājagahakassa seṭṭhissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-kd16:4.7.4: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā, bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ, ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd16:4.7.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd16:4.7.6: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ vassāvāsaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.7.9: Atha kho bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd16:4.8.1: Tena kho pana samayena anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bahumitto hoti bahusahāyo ādeyyavāco.
pli-tv-kd16:4.8.2: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati rājagahe taṃ karaṇīyaṃ tīretvā yena sāvatthi tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd16:4.8.3: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati antarāmagge manusse āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd16:4.8.4: “ārāme, ayyā, karotha, vihāre patiṭṭhāpetha, dānāni paṭṭhapetha.
pli-tv-kd16:4.8.6: So ca mayā bhagavā nimantito iminā maggena āgacchissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.8.7: Atha kho te manussā anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā uyyojitā ārāme akaṃsu, vihāre patiṭṭhāpesuṃ, dānāni paṭṭhapesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:4.8.8: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati sāvatthiṃ gantvā samantā sāvatthiṃ anuvilokesi—
pli-tv-kd16:4.8.10: Yaṃ assa gāmato neva atidūre na accāsanne, gamanāgamanasampannaṃ, atthikānaṃ atthikānaṃ manussānaṃ abhikkamanīyaṃ, divā appākiṇṇaṃ, rattiṃ appasaddaṃ, appanigghosaṃ, vijanavātaṃ, manussarāhasseyyakaṃ, paṭisallānasāruppan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.9.1: Addasā kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati jetassa kumārassa uyyānaṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:4.9.2: gāmato neva atidūre na accāsanne, gamanāgamanasampannaṃ, atthikānaṃ atthikānaṃ manussānaṃ abhikkamanīyaṃ, divā appākiṇṇaṃ, rattiṃ appasaddaṃ, appanigghosaṃ, vijanavātaṃ, manussarāhasseyyakaṃ, paṭisallānasāruppaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:4.9.3: Disvāna yena jeto kumāro tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā jetaṃ kumāraṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd16:4.9.10: “yato tayā, ayyaputta, aggho kato, gahito ārāmo”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.9.11: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati sakaṭehi hiraññaṃ nibbāhāpetvā jetavanaṃ koṭisantharaṃ santharāpesi.
pli-tv-kd16:4.10.1: Sakiṃ nīhaṭaṃ hiraññaṃ thokassa okāsassa koṭṭhakasāmantā nappahoti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.10.2: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati manusse āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd16:4.10.6: “na kho idaṃ orakaṃ bhavissati, yathāyaṃ gahapati tāva bahuṃ hiraññaṃ pariccajatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:4.10.13: ayaṃ kho jeto kumāro abhiññāto ñātamanusso;
pli-tv-kd16:4.10.14: mahatthiko kho pana evarūpānaṃ ñātamanussānaṃ imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasādoti—
pli-tv-kd16:4.10.16: Atha kho jeto kumāro tasmiṃ okāse koṭṭhakaṃ māpesi.
pli-tv-kd16:4.10.17: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati jetavane vihāre kārāpesi, pariveṇāni kārāpesi, koṭṭhake kārāpesi, upaṭṭhānasālāyo kārāpesi, aggisālāyo kārāpesi, kappiyakuṭiyo kārāpesi, vaccakuṭiyo kārāpesi, caṅkame kārāpesi, caṅkamanasālāyo kārāpesi, udapāne kārāpesi, udapānasālāyo kārāpesi, jantāghare kārāpesi, jantāgharasālāyo kārāpesi, pokkharaṇiyo kārāpesi, maṇḍape kārāpesi.
pli-tv-kd16:5.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena vesālī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd16:5.1.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena vesālī tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd16:5.1.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:5.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena manussā sakkaccaṃ navakammaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-kd16:5.1.5: Yepi bhikkhū navakammaṃ adhiṭṭhenti tepi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhenti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena.
pli-tv-kd16:5.1.6: Atha kho aññatarassa daliddassa tunnavāyassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd16:5.1.7: “na kho idaṃ orakaṃ bhavissati, yathayime manussā sakkaccaṃ navakammaṃ karonti;
pli-tv-kd16:5.1.9: Atha kho so daliddo tunnavāyo sāmaṃ cikkhallaṃ madditvā iṭṭhakāyo cinitvā kuṭṭaṃ uṭṭhāpesi.
pli-tv-kd16:5.1.10: Tena akusalakena citā vaṅkā bhitti paripati.
pli-tv-kd16:5.1.12: tatiyampi kho so daliddo tunnavāyo sāmaṃ cikkhallaṃ madditvā iṭṭhakāyo cinitvā kuṭṭaṃ uṭṭhāpesi.
pli-tv-kd16:5.1.13: Tena akusalakena citā vaṅkā bhitti paripati.
pli-tv-kd16:5.2.1: Atha kho so daliddo tunnavāyo ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-kd16:5.2.2: “ye imesaṃ samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ denti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ, te ime ovadanti anusāsanti, tesañca navakammaṃ adhiṭṭhenti.
pli-tv-kd16:5.2.4: Na maṃ koci ovadati vā anusāsati vā navakammaṃ vā adhiṭṭhetī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:5.2.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tassa daliddassa tunnavāyassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-kd16:5.2.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:5.2.7: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd16:5.2.10: ‘kinti nu kho vihāro khippaṃ pariyosānaṃ gaccheyyā’ti;
pli-tv-kd16:5.3.2: Paṭhamaṃ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd16:5.3.4: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmassa gahapatino vihāraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno navakammaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd16:5.3.7: Saṃgho itthannāmassa gahapatino vihāraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno navakammaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd16:5.3.8: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa gahapatino vihāraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno navakammassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd16:5.3.10: Dinno saṃghena itthannāmassa gahapatino vihāro itthannāmassa bhikkhuno navakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:5.3.11: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā vesāliyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd16:6.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antevāsikā bhikkhū buddhappamukhassa saṃghassa purato purato gantvā vihāre pariggaṇhanti, seyyāyo pariggaṇhanti—
pli-tv-kd16:6.1.3: “idaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyānaṃ bhavissati, idaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ bhavissati, idaṃ amhākaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.1.4: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto buddhappamukhassa saṃghassa piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gantvā vihāresu pariggahitesu, seyyāsu pariggahitāsu, seyyaṃ alabhamāno aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd16:6.1.5: Atha kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya ukkāsi.
pli-tv-kd16:6.1.10: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.2: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antevāsikā bhikkhū buddhappamukhassa saṃghassa purato purato gantvā vihāre pariggaṇhanti, seyyāyo pariggaṇhanti—
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.3: idaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyānaṃ bhavissati, idaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ bhavissati, idaṃ amhākaṃ bhavissatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.6: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā buddhappamukhassa saṃghassa purato purato gantvā vihāre pariggahessanti, seyyāyo pariggahessanti—
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.7: idaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyānaṃ bhavissati, idaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ bhavissati, idaṃ amhākaṃ bhavissatīti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.13: “yo, bhagavā, khattiyakulā pabbajito so arahati aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.15: “yo, bhagavā, brāhmaṇakulā pabbajito so arahati aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.17: “yo, bhagavā, gahapatikulā pabbajito so arahati aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.19: “yo, bhagavā, suttantiko so arahati aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.21: “yo, bhagavā, vinayadharo so arahati aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.23: “yo, bhagavā, dhammakathiko so arahati aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.25: “yo, bhagavā, paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī so arahati aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.27: “yo, bhagavā, dutiyassa jhānassa lābhī so arahati aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.29: “yo, bhagavā, tatiyassa jhānassa lābhī so arahati aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.31: “yo, bhagavā, catutthassa jhānassa lābhī so arahati aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.33: “yo, bhagavā, sotāpanno so arahati aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.37: yo, bhagavā, arahā so arahati aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.39: “yo, bhagavā, tevijjo so arahati aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.2.41: “yo, bhagavā, chaḷabhiñño so arahati aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.3.4: tittiro ca, makkaṭo ca, hatthināgo ca.
pli-tv-kd16:6.3.5: Te aññamaññaṃ agāravā appatissā asabhāgavuttikā viharanti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.3.6: Atha kho, bhikkhave, tesaṃ sahāyānaṃ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd16:6.3.7: ‘aho nūna mayaṃ jāneyyāma yaṃ amhākaṃ jātiyā mahantataraṃ taṃ mayaṃ sakkareyyāma garuṃ kareyyāma māneyyāma pūjeyyāma, tassa ca mayaṃ ovāde tiṭṭheyyāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.3.8: Atha kho, bhikkhave, tittiro ca makkaṭo ca hatthināgaṃ pucchiṃsu—
pli-tv-kd16:6.3.10: ‘Yadāhaṃ, sammā, poto homi, imaṃ nigrodhaṃ antarā satthīnaṃ karitvā atikkamāmi, aggaṅkurakaṃ me udaraṃ chupati.
pli-tv-kd16:6.3.12: Atha kho, bhikkhave, tittiro ca hatthināgo ca makkaṭaṃ pucchiṃsu—
pli-tv-kd16:6.3.14: ‘Yadāhaṃ, sammā, chāpo homi, chamāyaṃ nisīditvā imassa nigrodhassa aggaṅkurakaṃ khādāmi.
pli-tv-kd16:6.3.16: Atha kho, bhikkhave, makkaṭo ca hatthināgo ca tittiraṃ pucchiṃsu—
pli-tv-kd16:6.3.19: Tato ahaṃ phalaṃ bhakkhitvā imasmiṃ okāse vaccaṃ akāsiṃ;
pli-tv-kd16:6.3.22: Atha kho, bhikkhave, makkaṭo ca hatthināgo ca tittiraṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:6.3.24: Taṃ mayaṃ sakkarissāma garuṃ karissāma mānessāma pūjessāma, tuyhañca mayaṃ ovāde patiṭṭhissāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.3.25: Atha kho, bhikkhave, tittiro makkaṭañca hatthināgañca pañcasu sīlesu samādapesi, attanā ca pañcasu sīlesu samādāya vattati.
pli-tv-kd16:6.3.26: Te aññamaññaṃ sagāravā sappatissā sabhāgavuttikā viharitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd16:6.3.27: Evaṃ kho taṃ, bhikkhave, tittiriyaṃ nāma brahmacariyaṃ ahosi.
pli-tv-kd16:6.4.1: Te hi nāma, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatā pāṇā aññamaññaṃ sagāravā sappatissā sabhāgavuttikā viharissanti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.4.2: Idha kho taṃ, bhikkhave, sobhetha yaṃ tumhe evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitā samānā aññamaññaṃ agāravā appatissā asabhāgavuttikā vihareyyātha?
pli-tv-kd16:6.4.6: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ, paccuṭṭhānaṃ, añjalikammaṃ, sāmīcikammaṃ, aggāsanaṃ, aggodakaṃ, aggapiṇḍaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:6.4.7: Na ca, bhikkhave, saṃghikaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ paṭibāhitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.2: pure upasampannena pacchā upasampanno avandiyo, anupasampanno avandiyo, nānāsaṃvāsako vuḍḍhataro adhammavādī avandiyo, mātugāmo avandiyo, paṇḍako avandiyo, pārivāsiko avandiyo, mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho avandiyo, mānattāraho avandiyo, mānattacāriko avandiyo, abbhānāraho avandiyo.
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.5: pacchā upasampannena pure upasampanno vandiyo, nānāsaṃvāsako vuḍḍhataro dhammavādī vandiyo, sadevake bhikkhave loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vandiyo.
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.8: Tena kho pana samayena manussā saṃghaṃ uddissa maṇḍape paṭiyādenti, santhare paṭiyādenti, okāse paṭiyādenti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.10: “saṃghikaññeva bhagavatā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ anuññātaṃ, no uddissakatan”ti buddhappamukhassa saṃghassa purato purato gantvā maṇḍapepi pariggaṇhanti, santharepi pariggaṇhanti, okāsepi pariggaṇhanti—
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.11: “idaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyānaṃ bhavissati, idaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ bhavissati, idaṃ amhākaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.12: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto buddhappamukhassa saṃghassa piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gantvā maṇḍapesu pariggahitesu, santharesu pariggahitesu, okāsesu pariggahitesu, okāsaṃ alabhamāno aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.13: Atha kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya ukkāsi.
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.18: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.19: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.20: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antevāsikā bhikkhū—
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.21: ‘saṃghikaññeva bhagavatā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ anuññātaṃ, no uddissakatan’ti buddhappamukhassa saṃghassa purato purato gantvā maṇḍape pariggaṇhanti, santhare pariggaṇhanti, okāse pariggaṇhanti—
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.22: idaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyānaṃ bhavissati, idaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ bhavissati, idaṃ amhākaṃ bhavissatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.29: Tena kho pana samayena manussā bhattagge antaraghare uccāsayanamahāsayanāni paññapenti, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.30: āsandiṃ, pallaṅkaṃ, gonakaṃ, cittakaṃ, paṭikaṃ, paṭalikaṃ, tūlikaṃ, vikatikaṃ, uddalomiṃ, ekantalomiṃ, kaṭṭissaṃ, koseyyaṃ, kuttakaṃ, hatthattharaṃ, assattharaṃ, rathattharaṃ, ajinapaveṇiṃ, kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇaṃ, sauttaracchadaṃ, ubhatolohitakūpadhānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.36: Tena kho pana samayena manussā bhattagge antaraghare tūlonaddhaṃ mañcampi pīṭhampi paññapenti.
pli-tv-kd16:6.5.39: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gihivikataṃ abhinisīdituṃ, na tveva abhinipajjitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:9.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena sāvatthi tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd16:9.1.2: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd16:9.1.3: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd16:9.1.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd16:9.1.5: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:9.1.7: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd16:9.1.8: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi—
pli-tv-kd16:9.1.10: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-kd16:9.1.11: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā, bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ, ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd16:9.1.12: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd16:9.1.14: “Tena hi tvaṃ, gahapati, jetavanaṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṃghassa patiṭṭhapehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:9.1.15: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavato paṭissutvā jetavanaṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṃghassa patiṭṭhāpesi.
pli-tv-kd16:9.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ imāhi gāthāhi anumodi—
pli-tv-kd16:9.2.24: Atha kho bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ imāhi gāthāhi anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd16:10.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa ājīvakasāvakassa mahāmattassa saṃghabhattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:10.1.2: Āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pacchā āgantvā vippakatabhojanaṃ ānantarikaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpesi.
pli-tv-kd16:10.1.4: Atha kho so mahāmatto ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-kd16:10.1.5: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā pacchā āgantvā vippakatabhojanaṃ ānantarikaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti.
pli-tv-kd16:10.1.7: Nanu nāma labbhā aññatrāpi nisinnena yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitun”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:10.1.8: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tassa mahāmattassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-kd16:10.1.9: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd16:10.1.10: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pacchā āgantvā vippakatabhojanaṃ ānantarikaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpessati.
pli-tv-kd16:10.1.12: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:10.1.13: “Saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, upananda, pacchā āgantvā vippakatabhojanaṃ ānantarikaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpesi, bhattaggaṃ kolāhalaṃ ahosī”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:10.1.16: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, pacchā āgantvā vippakatabhojanaṃ ānantarikaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpessasi?
pli-tv-kd16:10.1.23: Sace vuṭṭhāpeti, pavārito ca hoti, ‘gaccha udakaṃ āharā’ti vattabbo.
pli-tv-kd16:10.1.25: No ce labhetha, sādhukaṃ sitthāni gilitvā vuḍḍhatarassa bhikkhuno āsanaṃ dātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:10.1.26: Na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, kenaci pariyāyena vuḍḍhatarassa bhikkhuno āsanaṃ paṭibāhitabbanti vadāmi.
pli-tv-kd16:10.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū gilāne bhikkhū vuṭṭhāpenti.
pli-tv-kd16:10.2.4: “Mayaṃ āyasmante vuṭṭhāpessāmā”ti pariggahetvā vuṭṭhāpetvā ṭhitake muñcanti.
pli-tv-kd16:10.2.9: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū—
pli-tv-kd16:10.2.13: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū lesakappena senāsanaṃ paṭibāhanti.
pli-tv-kd16:11.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena sattarasavaggiyā bhikkhū aññataraṃ paccantimaṃ mahāvihāraṃ paṭisaṅkharonti—
pli-tv-kd16:11.1.3: Addasaṃsu kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū vihāraṃ paṭisaṅkharonte.
pli-tv-kd16:11.1.9: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:11.1.18: “Uṭṭhethāvuso, amhākaṃ vihāro pāpuṇātī”ti kupitā anattamanā gīvāyaṃ gahetvā nikkaḍḍhanti.
pli-tv-kd16:11.1.22: “Ime, āvuso, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā amhe saṃghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:11.1.23: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd16:11.1.24: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā bhikkhū saṃghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:11.1.25: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd16:11.1.26: “saccaṃ kira, tumhe bhikkhave, kupitā anattamanā saṃghikā vihārā bhikkhū nikkaḍḍhathā”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:11.1.30: “na, bhikkhave, kupitena anattamanena bhikkhu saṃghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhitabbo.
pli-tv-kd16:11.2.4: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ sammannituṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:11.2.5: yo na chandāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na dosāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṃ gaccheyya, gahitāgahitañca jāneyya.
pli-tv-kd16:11.2.7: Paṭhamaṃ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd16:11.2.9: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd16:11.2.13: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno senāsanaggāhāpakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd16:11.2.16: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:11.3.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ bhikkhū gaṇetuṃ, bhikkhū gaṇetvā seyyā gaṇetuṃ, seyyā gaṇetvā seyyaggena gāhetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:11.3.11: Gahite anubhāge añño bhikkhu āgacchati, akāmā na dātabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:11.3.12: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū nissīme ṭhitassa senāsanaṃ gāhenti.
pli-tv-kd16:11.3.16: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū senāsanaṃ gahetvā sabbakālaṃ paṭibāhanti.
pli-tv-kd16:11.3.20: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vassānaṃ temāsaṃ paṭibāhituṃ, utukālaṃ pana na paṭibāhitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:11.4.8: Aparajjugatāya pavāraṇāya āyatiṃ vassāvāsatthāya antarāmuttako gāhetabbo.
pli-tv-kd16:11.4.11: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto sāvatthiyaṃ senāsanaṃ gahetvā aññataraṃ gāmakāvāsaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd16:11.4.14: “ayaṃ, āvuso, āyasmā upanando sakyaputto bhaṇḍanakārako kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako.
pli-tv-kd16:11.4.15: Sacāyaṃ idha vassaṃ vasissati, sabbeva mayaṃ na phāsu bhavissāma.
pli-tv-kd16:11.4.17: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:11.4.18: “nanu tayā, āvuso upananda, sāvatthiyaṃ senāsanaṃ gahitan”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:11.4.20: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ, āvuso upananda, eko dve paṭibāhasī”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:11.4.23: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd16:11.4.24: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto eko dve paṭibāhessatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:11.4.26: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, upananda, eko dve paṭibāhasī”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:11.4.29: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, eko dve paṭibāhissasi?
pli-tv-kd16:11.4.30: Tattha tayā, moghapurisa, gahitaṃ idha muttaṃ, idha tayā gahitaṃ tatra muttaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:11.4.31: Evaṃ kho tvaṃ, moghapurisa, ubhayattha paribāhiro.
pli-tv-kd16:13.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ anekapariyāyena vinayakathaṃ kathesi, vinayassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, vinayapariyattiyā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, ādissa ādissa āyasmato upālissa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
pli-tv-kd16:13.1.3: “bhagavā kho anekapariyāyena vinayakathaṃ katheti, vinayassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, vinayapariyattiyā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, ādissa ādissa āyasmato upālissa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
pli-tv-kd16:13.1.4: Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:13.1.5: Tedha bahū bhikkhū therā ca navā ca majjhimā ca āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇanti.
pli-tv-kd16:13.1.6: Āyasmā upāli ṭhitakova uddisati therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gāravena.
pli-tv-kd16:13.1.8: Tattha therā ceva bhikkhū kilamanti, āyasmā ca upāli kilamati.
pli-tv-kd16:13.1.10: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, navakena bhikkhunā uddisantena samake vā āsane nisīdituṃ, uccatare vā dhammagāravena;
pli-tv-kd16:13.1.11: therena bhikkhunā uddisāpentena samake vā āsane nisīdituṃ, nīcatare vā dhammagāravenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:13.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bahū bhikkhū āyasmato upālissa santike ṭhitakā uddesaṃ paṭimānentā kilamanti.
pli-tv-kd16:13.2.8: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū samānāsanikā mañce nisīditvā mañcaṃ bhindiṃsu, pīṭhe nisīditvā pīṭhaṃ bhindiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd16:13.2.11: Tivaggopi mañce nisīditvā mañcaṃ bhindi, pīṭhe nisīditvā pīṭhaṃ bhindi …pe…
pli-tv-kd16:13.2.13: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū asamānāsanikehi saha dīghāsane nisīdituṃ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-kd16:13.2.15: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ṭhapetvā paṇḍakaṃ, mātugāmaṃ, ubhatobyañjanakaṃ, asamānāsanikehi saha dīghāsane nisīditun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:13.2.19: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pahoti, ettakaṃ pacchimaṃ dīghāsanan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:13.2.20: Tena kho pana samayena visākhā migāramātā saṃghassa atthāya sāḷindaṃ pāsādaṃ kārāpetukāmā hoti hatthinakhakaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:13.2.22: “kiṃ nu kho bhagavatā pāsādaparibhogo anuññāto kiṃ ananuññāto”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:13.2.25: Tena kho pana samayena rañño pasenadissa kosalassa ayyikā kālaṅkatā hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:13.2.26: Tassa kālaṃkiriyāya saṃghassa bahuṃ akappiyabhaṇḍaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:13.2.27: āsandi, pallaṅko, gonako, cittako, paṭikā, paṭalikā, tūlikā, vikatikā, uddalomī, ekantalomī, kaṭṭissaṃ, koseyyaṃ, kuttakaṃ, hatthattharaṃ, assattharaṃ, rathattharaṃ, ajinapaveṇi, kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇaṃ, sauttaracchadaṃ, ubhatolohitakūpadhānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:13.2.29: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, āsandiyā pāde chinditvā paribhuñjituṃ, pallaṅkassa vāḷe bhinditvā paribhuñjituṃ, tūlikaṃ vijaṭetvā bibbohanaṃ kātuṃ, avasesaṃ bhūmattharaṇaṃ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:15.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyā avidūre aññatarasmiṃ gāmakāvāse āvāsikā bhikkhū upaddutā honti āgantukagamikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapentā.
pli-tv-kd16:15.1.3: “etarahi kho mayaṃ, āvuso, upaddutā āgantukagamikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapentā.
pli-tv-kd16:15.1.4: Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, sabbaṃ saṃghikaṃ senāsanaṃ ekassa dema.
pli-tv-kd16:15.1.6: Te sabbaṃ saṃghikaṃ senāsanaṃ ekassa adaṃsu.
pli-tv-kd16:15.1.11: “Kiṃ pana tumhe, āvuso, saṃghikaṃ senāsanaṃ vissajjethā”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:15.1.13: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd16:15.1.15: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd16:15.1.16: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū saṃghikaṃ senāsanaṃ vissajjentī”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:15.1.19: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā saṃghikaṃ senāsanaṃ vissajjessanti?
pli-tv-kd16:15.2.1: “Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, avissajjiyāni, na vissajjetabbāni, saṃghena vā gaṇena vā puggalena vā.
pli-tv-kd16:15.2.6: idaṃ paṭhamaṃ avissajjiyaṃ, na vissajjetabbaṃ, saṃghena vā gaṇena vā puggalena vā.
pli-tv-kd16:15.2.10: idaṃ dutiyaṃ avissajjiyaṃ, na vissajjetabbaṃ, saṃghena vā gaṇena vā puggalena vā.
pli-tv-kd16:15.2.14: idaṃ tatiyaṃ avissajjiyaṃ, na vissajjetabbaṃ, saṃghena vā gaṇena vā puggalena vā.
pli-tv-kd16:15.2.17: Lohakumbhī, lohabhāṇakaṃ, lohavārako, lohakaṭāhaṃ, vāsi, parasu, kuṭhārī, kudālo, nikhādanaṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:15.2.18: idaṃ catutthaṃ avissajjiyaṃ, na vissajjetabbaṃ, saṃghena vā gaṇena vā puggalena vā.
pli-tv-kd16:15.2.21: Valli, veḷu, muñjaṃ, pabbajaṃ, tiṇaṃ, mattikā, dārubhaṇḍaṃ, mattikābhaṇḍaṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:15.2.22: idaṃ pañcamaṃ avissajjiyaṃ, na vissajjetabbaṃ, saṃghena vā gaṇena vā puggalena vā.
pli-tv-kd16:15.2.25: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca avissajjiyāni, na vissajjetabbāni, saṃghena vā gaṇena vā puggalena vā.
pli-tv-kd16:16.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena kīṭāgiri tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sāriputtamoggallānehi ca.
pli-tv-kd16:16.1.3: “bhagavā kira kīṭāgiriṃ āgacchati mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sāriputtamoggallānehi ca.
pli-tv-kd16:16.1.4: Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, sabbaṃ saṃghikaṃ senāsanaṃ bhājema.
pli-tv-kd16:16.1.5: Pāpicchā sāriputtamoggallānā, pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gatā;
pli-tv-kd16:16.1.6: na mayaṃ tesaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapessāmā”ti, te sabbaṃ saṃghikaṃ senāsanaṃ bhājesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:16.1.7: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena kīṭāgiri tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd16:16.1.8: Atha kho bhagavā sambahule bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd16:16.1.11: ‘bhagavā, āvuso, āgacchati mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sāriputtamoggallānehi ca.
pli-tv-kd16:16.1.12: Bhagavato ca, āvuso, senāsanaṃ paññapetha, bhikkhusaṃghassa ca, sāriputtamoggallānānañcā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:16.1.13: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissutvā yena assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:16.1.14: “bhagavā, āvuso, āgacchati mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sāriputtamoggallānehi ca.
pli-tv-kd16:16.1.15: Bhagavato ca, āvuso, senāsanaṃ paññapetha, bhikkhusaṃghassa ca, sāriputtamoggallānānañcā”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:16.1.19: Yasmiṃ vihāre bhagavā icchissati tasmiṃ vihāre vasissati.
pli-tv-kd16:16.1.20: Pāpicchā sāriputtamoggallānā, pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gatā.
pli-tv-kd16:16.2.1: “Kiṃ pana tumhe, āvuso, saṃghikaṃ senāsanaṃ bhājitthā”ti?
pli-tv-kd16:16.2.3: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd16:16.2.4: “kathañhi nāma assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū saṃghikaṃ senāsanaṃ bhājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:16.2.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd16:16.2.9: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā saṃghikaṃ senāsanaṃ bhājessanti?

pli-tv-kd16:16.2.18: idaṃ paṭhamaṃ avebhaṅgiyaṃ, na vibhajitabbaṃ, saṃghena vā gaṇena vā puggalena vā.

pli-tv-kd16:16.2.30: idaṃ catutthaṃ avebhaṅgiyaṃ, na vibhajitabbaṃ, saṃghena vā gaṇena vā puggalena vā.

pli-tv-kd16:16.2.34: idaṃ pañcamaṃ avebhaṅgiyaṃ, na vibhajitabbaṃ, saṃghena vā gaṇena vā puggalena vā.
pli-tv-kd16:16.2.37: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca avebhaṅgiyāni, na vibhajitabbāni, saṃghena vā gaṇena vā puggalena vā.
pli-tv-kd16:17.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā kīṭāgirismiṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena āḷavī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd16:17.1.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena āḷavī tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd16:17.1.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
pli-tv-kd16:17.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena āḷavakā bhikkhū evarūpāni navakammāni denti—
pli-tv-kd16:17.1.22: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd16:17.1.23: “kathañhi nāma āḷavakā bhikkhū evarūpāni navakammāni dassanti—
pli-tv-kd16:17.1.62: Na dhūmakālikampi pariyositaṃ vihāraṃ navakammaṃ dātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:17.1.64: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, akataṃ vā vippakataṃ vā navakammaṃ dātuṃ, khuddake vihāre kammaṃ oloketvā chappañcavassikaṃ navakammaṃ dātuṃ, aḍḍhayoge kammaṃ oloketvā sattaṭṭhavassikaṃ navakammaṃ dātuṃ, mahallake vihāre pāsāde vā kammaṃ oloketvā dasadvādasavassikaṃ navakammaṃ dātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:17.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū sabbe vihāre navakammaṃ denti.
pli-tv-kd16:17.2.5: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ekassa dve denti.
pli-tv-kd16:17.2.9: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū navakammaṃ gahetvā aññaṃ vāsenti.
pli-tv-kd16:17.2.13: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū navakammaṃ gahetvā saṃghikaṃ paṭibāhenti.
pli-tv-kd16:17.2.18: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū nissīme ṭhitassa navakammaṃ denti.
pli-tv-kd16:17.2.22: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū navakammaṃ gahetvā sabbakālaṃ paṭibāhanti.
pli-tv-kd16:17.2.26: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vassānaṃ temāsaṃ paṭibāhituṃ, utukālaṃ pana na paṭibāhitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū navakammaṃ gahetvā pakkamantipi, vibbhamantipi, kālampi karonti;
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.23: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu navakammaṃ gahetvā pakkamati—
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.25: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu navakammaṃ gahetvā vibbhamati …pe…
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.26: kālaṃ karoti, sāmaṇero paṭijānāti, sikkhaṃ paccakkhātako paṭijānāti, antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannako paṭijānāti, ummattako paṭijānāti, khittacitto paṭijānāti, vedanāṭṭo paṭijānāti, āpattiyā adassane ukkhittako paṭijānāti, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhittako paṭijānāti, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittako paṭijānāti, paṇḍako paṭijānāti, theyyasaṃvāsako paṭijānāti, titthiyapakkantako paṭijānāti, tiracchānagato paṭijānāti, mātughātako paṭijānāti, pitughātako paṭijānāti, arahantaghātako paṭijānāti, bhikkhunidūsako paṭijānāti, saṃghabhedako paṭijānāti, lohituppādako paṭijānāti, ubhatobyañjanako paṭijānāti—
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.28: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu navakammaṃ gahetvā vippakate pakkamati—
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.30: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu navakammaṃ gahetvā vippakate vibbhamati …pe…
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.33: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu navakammaṃ gahetvā pariyosite pakkamati—
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.35: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu navakammaṃ gahetvā pariyosite vibbhamati …pe…
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.36: kālaṃ karoti, sāmaṇero paṭijānāti, sikkhaṃ paccakkhātako paṭijānāti, antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannako paṭijānāti—
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.38: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu navakammaṃ gahetvā pariyosite ummattako paṭijānāti, khittacitto paṭijānāti, vedanāṭṭo paṭijānāti, āpattiyā adassane ukkhittako paṭijānāti, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhittako paṭijānāti, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittako paṭijānāti—
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.40: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu navakammaṃ gahetvā pariyosite paṇḍako paṭijānāti, theyyasaṃvāsako paṭijānāti, titthiyapakkantako paṭijānāti, tiracchānagato paṭijānāti, mātughātako paṭijānāti, pitughātako paṭijānāti, arahantaghātako paṭijānāti, bhikkhunidūsako paṭijānāti, saṃghabhedako paṭijānāti, lohituppādako paṭijānāti, ubhatobyañjanako paṭijānāti—
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.43: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū aññatarassa upāsakassa vihāraparibhogaṃ senāsanaṃ aññatra paribhuñjanti.
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.44: Atha kho so upāsako ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.45: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā aññatra paribhogaṃ aññatra paribhuñjissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.49: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū uposathaggampi sannisajjampi harituṃ kukkuccāyantā chamāya nisīdanti.
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.53: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa mahāvihāro undriyati.
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.57: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa senāsanaparikkhāriko mahaggho kambalo uppanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.60: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa senāsanaparikkhārikaṃ mahagghaṃ dussaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.63: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa acchacammaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.66: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa cakkalikaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:17.3.69: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa coḷakaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:20.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū adhotehi pādehi senāsanaṃ akkamanti.
pli-tv-kd16:20.1.6: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū allehi pādehi senāsanaṃ akkamanti.
pli-tv-kd16:20.1.11: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū saupāhanā senāsanaṃ akkamanti.
pli-tv-kd16:20.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū parikammakatāya bhūmiyā niṭṭhubhanti.
pli-tv-kd16:20.2.7: Tena kho pana samayena mañcapādāpi pīṭhapādāpi parikammakataṃ bhūmiṃ vilikhanti.
pli-tv-kd16:20.2.10: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū parikammakataṃ bhittiṃ apassenti.
pli-tv-kd16:20.2.16: Apassenaphalakaṃ heṭṭhato bhūmiṃ vilikhati, uparito bhittiñca.
pli-tv-kd16:20.2.18: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, heṭṭhato ca uparito ca coḷakena paliveṭhetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:20.2.19: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū dhotapādakā nipajjituṃ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-kd16:21.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena rājagahaṃ tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd16:21.1.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena rājagahaṃ tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd16:21.1.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-kd16:21.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahaṃ dubbhikkhaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:21.1.6: icchanti uddesabhattaṃ nimantanaṃ salākabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ uposathikaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ kātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:21.1.8: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, saṃghabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ nimantanaṃ salākabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ uposathikaṃ pāṭipadikan”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:21.1.10: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū attano varabhattāni gahetvā lāmakāni bhattāni bhikkhūnaṃ denti.
pli-tv-kd16:21.1.12: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ bhattuddesakaṃ sammannituṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:21.1.13: yo na chandāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na dosāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṃ gaccheyya, uddiṭṭhānuddiṭṭhañca jāneyya.
pli-tv-kd16:21.1.15: Paṭhamaṃ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd16:21.1.17: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhattuddesakaṃ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd16:21.1.21: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno bhattuddesakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd16:21.1.24: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:21.1.28: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, salākāya vā paṭṭikāya vā upanibandhitvā opuñjitvā bhattaṃ uddisitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:21.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa senāsanapaññāpako na hoti …pe…

pli-tv-kd16:21.2.11: yo na chandāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na dosāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṃ gaccheyya, bhājitābhājitañca jāneyya.
pli-tv-kd16:21.2.13: Paṭhamaṃ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd16:21.2.15: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ khajjakabhājakaṃ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd16:21.2.19: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno khajjakabhājakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd16:21.2.22: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:21.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa bhaṇḍāgāre appamattako parikkhāro uppanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd16:21.3.3: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ appamattakavissajjakaṃ sammannituṃ—
pli-tv-kd16:21.3.4: yo na chandāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na dosāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṃ gaccheyya, vissajjitāvissajjitañca jāneyya.
pli-tv-kd16:21.3.6: Paṭhamaṃ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd16:21.3.8: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ appamattakavissajjakaṃ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd16:21.3.12: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno appamattakavissajjakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd16:21.3.15: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd16:21.3.16: Tena appamattakavissajjakena bhikkhunā ekā sūci dātabbā, satthakaṃ dātabbaṃ, upāhanā dātabbā, kāyabandhanaṃ dātabbaṃ, aṃsabaddhako dātabbo, parissāvanaṃ dātabbaṃ, dhammakaraṇo dātabbo, kusi dātabbā, aḍḍhakusi dātabbā, maṇḍalaṃ dātabbaṃ, aḍḍhamaṇḍalaṃ dātabbaṃ, anuvāto dātabbo, paribhaṇḍaṃ dātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:21.3.17: Sace hoti saṃghassa sappi vā telaṃ vā madhu vā phāṇitaṃ vā, sakiṃ paṭisāyituṃ dātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:21.3.18: Sace punapi attho hoti, punapi dātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd16:21.3.20: Tena kho pana samayena saṃghassa sāṭiyaggāhāpako na hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd16:21.3.26: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ sāmaṇerapesakaṃ sammannituṃ—
